title: Is soft rock a genre? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most of today’s music consists of a blend of different genres. Soft rock tends to use elements from pop music while still incorporating the main instruments and rhythms as rock. Some bands such as Fall Out Boy and Panic! at the Disco can be considered “soft rock” as they don’t quite fit into the pop genre but aren’t as intense as rock and “rock ’n roll”.
